title: Accomplished Kudo-izer
description: You sent 3 Kudos to your friends. We reward you for such ambition!

title: Padawan
description: You sent 5 Kudos! You are a true Kudos padawan! The force is strong in this one.

title: Efficiency Award
description: You sent Kudos to 3 friends at once! Think of all the time you saved.
hint: Kudo a few birds with one stone.

title: Lucky 7
description: You got Kudos from 7 different friends. You're a lucky one!

title: Networker
description: You've sent Kudos to seven new players. Thanks for expanding the numbers of the collective, citizen.
win conditions: sent kudos to 7 different people who don't have accounts

title: Kudo Collector
description: You got four Kudos with _____. Such ____ ____, aren't they?
hint: Get your friends to send you ______.

title: Web Wrangler
description: You sent three web related Kudos. Who doesn't love a good spider?
hint: Won't someone think of the spiders?

title: Repeat Kudoer
description: You logged in two days in a row. Yes, we noticed.
win conditions: logged in 2 days in a row

title: Kudo Addiction
description: You logged in four days in a row. We know, it's hard to stay away!
win conditions: logged in 4 days in a row

title: Solstice
description: Happy Solstice! Now go forth and dish out some Kudo-y fun.
hint: Make sure to be on for the big day!
win conditions: logged in on the solstice (is that a set date??)
